$ref.description: Path to content that replaces the $ref

base_url.description: Base URL for the DSS instance according to the ASTM F3411 API appropriate to the specified rid_version

has_private_address.description: Whether this DSS instance is expected to have a private address that is not publicly addressable.

local_debug.description:
Whether this DSS instance is running locally for debugging or development purposes. Mostly used for relaxing
constraints around encryption.
Assumed to be true if left unspecified and has_private_address is true, otherwise defaults to false

participant_id.description: ID of the USS responsible for this DSS instance

rid_version.description: Version of ASTM F3411 implemented by this DSS instance
